mapper.select: select pseq,pcontent,pdate,ptitle from P_board order by pseq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P_BOARD(PSEQ, PCONTENT, PDATE, PTITLE) VALUES(P_BOARD_SEQ.nextval,#{pcontent},sysdate, #{ptitle})
mapper.select: select pseq,pcontent,pdate,ptitle from P_board where pseq = #{pseq}
mapper.update: UPDATE P_BOARD SET PCONTENT=#{pcontent}, PTITLE=#{ptitle} WHERE PSEQ=#{pseq}
